panels.title: Overview

targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Gists WHERE Disabled = FALSE AND Published > (UTC_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 7 DAY);

panels.title: Total number of active gists added in last 7 days

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  (SELECT Title FROM Feeds WHERE Id = FeedId) AS "Feed", 
  COUNT(FeedId) AS "# Gists" FROM Gists WHERE Disabled = FALSE AND Published > (UTC_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 7 DAY) 
GROUP BY FeedId;

panels.title: Number of active gists added in last 7 days by feed

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  CONCAT(
    '{',
    REGEXP_REPLACE(
      CONCAT('"', REPLACE(Tags, ';;', '", "'), '"'),
      '"([^"]+)"',
      '"\\1": 1'
    ),
    '}'
  ) AS 'Tags'
  FROM Gists 
  WHERE Disabled = FALSE 
    AND Published > (UTC_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 7 DAY);

panels.title: Tag distribution over gists in last 7 days

targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Gists WHERE Disabled = TRUE AND Published > (UTC_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 7 DAY);

panels.title: Total number of disabled gists added in last 7 days
Total number of registered Telegram users

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  (SELECT Title FROM Feeds WHERE Id = FeedId) AS "Feed", 
  COUNT(FeedId) AS "# Gists" FROM Gists WHERE Disabled = TRUE AND Published > (UTC_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 7 DAY) 
GROUP BY FeedId;
